Package com.mhealthatlas.enterpriseapps.controller

Class PortfolioQueryController

java.lang.Object
com.mhealthatlas.enterpriseapps.controller.PortfolioQueryController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/enterprise-apps")
public class PortfolioQueryController
extends java.lang.Object
PortfolioQueryController is the class containing all API endpoints for quering portfolio informations.

  • Method Details

    • getPortfolios

      @GetMapping("/enterprises/{enterprise}/portfolios") @ResponseStatus(OK) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<PortfolioQueryDto>> getPortfolios​(@PathVariable java.lang.String enterprise, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Queries the enterprise service database for portfolios of the provided enterprise.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /enterprises/{enterprise}/portfolios

      Only users who are members of the specified enterprise can access the API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      enterprise - the enterprise name; not null; request path parameter
      authentication - the authentication object, injected by spring security
      Returns:
      200 OK response containing the portfolios of the enterprise if the user is a member of the enterprise;
      403 FORBIDDEN response otherwise;

    • getPortfolio

      @GetMapping("/enterprises/{enterprise}/portfolios/{portfolioId}") @ResponseStatus(OK) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PortfolioQueryDto> getPortfolio​(@PathVariable java.lang.String enterprise, @PathVariable java.lang.Long portfolioId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Queries the enterprise service database by the provided enterprise and portfolio id.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /enterprises/{enterprise}/portfolios/{portfolioId}

      Only users who are members of the specified enterprise can access the API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      enterprise - the enterprise name; not null; request path parameter
      portfolioId - the portfolio id; not null; request path parameter
      authentication - the authentication object, injected by spring security
      Returns:
      200 OK response containing the portfolio if the user is a member of the enterprise and the portfolio was found;
      404 NOT_FOUND response if the user is a member of the enterprise and the portfolio was not found;
      403 FORBIDDEN response otherwise;

    • getPortfolioStructure

      @GetMapping("/enterprises/{enterprise}/portfolios/{portfolioId}/tree") @ResponseStatus(OK) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<ViewPortfolioClassSubtreeDto>> getPortfolioStructure​(@PathVariable java.lang.String enterprise, @PathVariable java.lang.Long portfolioId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Queries the enterprise service database for the portfolio structure by the provided enterprise and portfolio id.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /enterprises/{enterprise}/portfolios/{portfolioId}/tree

      Only users who are members of the specified enterprise can access the API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      enterprise - the enterprise name; not null; request path parameter
      portfolioId - the portfolio id; not null; request path parameter
      authentication - the authentication object, injected by spring security
      Returns:
      200 OK response containing the portfolio structure if the user is a member of the enterprise and the portfolio was found;
      404 NOT_FOUND response if the user is a member of the enterprise and the portfolio was not found;
      403 FORBIDDEN response otherwise;

    • getPortfolioClass

      @GetMapping("/enterprises/{enterprise}/portfolios/{portfolioId}/classes/{portfolioClassId}") @ResponseStatus(OK) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ViewPortfolioClassDto> getPortfolioClass​(@PathVariable java.lang.String enterprise, @PathVariable java.lang.Long portfolioId, @PathVariable java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Queries the enterprise service database for the portfolio class by the provided enterprise, portfolio id and portfolio class id.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /enterprises/{enterprise}/portfolios/{portfolioId}/classes/{portfolioClassId}

      Only users who are members of the specified enterprise can access the API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      enterprise - the enterprise name; not null; request path parameter
      portfolioId - the portfolio id; not null; request path parameter
      portfolioClassId - the portfolio class id; not null; request path parameter
      authentication - the authentication object, injected by spring security
      Returns:
      200 OK response containing the portfolio class if the user is a member of the enterprise and the portfolio class was found;
      404 NOT_FOUND response if the user is a member of the enterprise and the portfolio class was not found;
      403 FORBIDDEN response otherwise;

    • getPortfolioClassStructure

      @GetMapping("/enterprises/{enterprise}/portfolios/{portfolioId}/classes/{portfolioClassId}/tree") @ResponseStatus(OK) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ViewPortfolioClassSubtreeDto> getPortfolioClassStructure​(@PathVariable java.lang.String enterprise, @PathVariable java.lang.Long portfolioId, @PathVariable java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Queries the enterprise service database for the portfolio class subree structure by the provided enterprise, portfolio id and portfolio class id.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /enterprises/{enterprise}/portfolios/{portfolioId}/classes/{portfolioClassId}/tree

      Only users who are members of the specified enterprise can access the API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      enterprise - the enterprise name; not null; request path parameter
      portfolioId - the portfolio id; not null; request path parameter
      portfolioClassId - the portfolio class id; not null; request path parameter
      authentication - the authentication object, injected by spring security
      Returns:
      200 OK response containing the portfolio subtree structure if the user is a member of the enterprise and the portfolio class was found;
      404 NOT_FOUND response if the user is a member of the enterprise and the portfolio class was not found;
      403 FORBIDDEN response otherwise;

    • getAppVersionAnnotation

      @GetMapping("/enterprises/{enterprise}/apps/{appType}/{appVersionId}/annotations") @ResponseStatus(OK) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ViewAppVersionAnnotationsDto> getAppVersionAnnotation​(@PathVariable java.lang.String enterprise, @PathVariable AppType appType, @PathVariable java.lang.Long appVersionId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Queries the enterprise service database for application version annotations by the provided enterprise, application type and application version id.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /enterprises/{enterprise}/apps/{appType}/{appVersionId}/annotations

      Only users who are members of the specified enterprise can access the API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      enterprise - the enterprise name; not null; request path parameter
      appType - the application type; not null; request path parameter
      appVersionId - the application version id; not null; request path parameter
      authentication - the authentication object, injected by spring security
      Returns:
      200 OK response containing the annotations for the application version if the user is a member of the enterprise and the application version exists;
      404 NOT_FOUND response if the user is a member of the enterprise and the application version does not exists;
      403 FORBIDDEN response otherwise;
